<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->
# MatchWithLvasgn Node Formatting

Represents matching a regex that produces local variables (i.e. `/(?<match>bar)/ =~ 'bar'`)

Each named group in regex declares a local variable.
<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Fails because no tests are written

Before:

```ruby
/(?<match>bar)/ =~ "bar"
```

After:

```ruby
/(?<match>bar)/ =~ "bar"
```
